message.body: Are the streets getting worst
Not really... its the unused parts like the side walks. Straight ice. The roads are slush but mostly washed away so not too bad
Ok
Did you get home
I literally just parked.. walking to the house now
Did you get a good spot
Not too bad... near 12th & shunk. In front of italianos water ice so only a block away
Do you have to put a police report in for your car
Noo nothing they can do about. Just have to call my insurance company
I just walked in the house
Dad said you should
What can they do about?
Nothing but the insurance co might ask
How much is your detectable
Then ill tell them no bec the person fled the scene. No big deal. Calling the cops is a waste of everyone's time.
$500 deductible
Even if you Did.nt do the hitting
Yea that's just the price regardless
Did you get in touch with your insurance co
Not yet have to wait til lunch break
Called the ins co... got a claim number. A representative will call me back tomorrow
Ok I hope you don't have to pay much
Me too... but I can use progressive's shop to fix it, use one in network with them or anyone else I want. When Steph's car got hit last month, she took hers to rocco's collision on Snyder ave
